description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ab7se","text":"MTT ((3-(4,5-Dimethylthiazol-2-yl)-2,5-Diphenyltetrazolium Bromide)) is used to assess cell viability as a function of redox potential. Actively respiring cells convert the water-soluble MTT to an insoluble purple formazan.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":60}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9bno9","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2dins","text":"AMJ13: 2 (Ahmed.Murtuda ,Jabria 2013)cell line:","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":47},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":6,"length":41}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5q9jm","text":"The cell line of breast cancer has been obtained from Iraqi breast cancer which originated from the prime tumor of an old Iraqi woman (70 years) with a histological identification with carcinoma of infiltrating ductal (1).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bo94c","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jspp","text":"SK-GT-4:esophageal carcinomacell line was established from a primary tumors in 1989 from a 89 year-old Caucasian male who presented with dysphagia secondary to a well-differentiated adenocarcinoma arising in the Barrett epithelium of the distal oesophagus ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"146tn","text":"SK-GT-4 cell line, was maintained in MEM supplemented with 10% Fetal bovine, 100 units/mL penicillin, and 100 µg/mL streptomycin. Cells were passaged using Trypsin-EDTA reseeded at 50% confluence twice a week, and incubated at 37 °C ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7d9eq","text":"Cell lines were seeded at 1 × 104cells/well. After 24 hrs. or a confluent monolayer was achieved, cells were treated with tested compound","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":32,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"blg0g","text":"Cell viability was measured after 72h of treatment by removing the medium","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cuv2i","text":"After removing the MTT solution, the crystals remaining in the wells were solubilized by the addition of 130 µL of DMSO (Dimethyl Sulphoxide) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9b9n7","text":"followed by 37 °C incubation for 15 min with shaking (orbital shaker)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"49bms","text":"The absorbency was determined on a microplate reader at 492 nm (test wavelength)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c2dtv","text":" The inhibition rate of cell growth (the percentage of cytotoxicity) was calculated as the following equation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9gi3i","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7jq0n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"03941080B2EA11EDA0877705FD745871","height":81,"id":345109,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ktazb37ex.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ktaxb37ex.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/ktayb37ex.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ktawb37ex.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cstg","text":"To determine the cytotoxic effect, the MTT cell viability assay was conducted on 96-well plates","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4q1ro","text":"NHF cell line, was maintained in MEM supplemented with 10% Fetal bovine, 100 units/mL penicillin, and 100 µg/mL streptomycin. Cells were passaged using Trypsin-EDTA reseeded at 50% confluence twice a week, and incubated at 37 °C ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":229}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B3D522E0B2EA11EDAEA60A58A9FEAC02","url":null}}}}
